Hey no problem. My apologies for the slow initial seed. ADSL with upstream limited to around 60KBps.

For any future releases i might do, is it prefferable to shoot for smaller size/lower quality for ease of download or are high quality rips what people want despite the size?

Also I find that torrents which contain multiple spanned archives dont get seeded as well and with the high compression allready in the Xvid and MP3 audio codecs they dont reduce size very much anyway so just sharing the file seems best. Anyone have any reason to compress?
